hero.title: AUSTRALIAN LABRADOODLE IN ITALY
hero.subtitle: Lola brought us more than tenderness; When a dream comes true, a life full of furry love begins!

soDoodle.title: Lola brought us more than tenderness: she gave us passion for this breed.
soDoodle.subtitle: When a dream comes true, a life full of furry love begins.
soDoodle.description: It all started with my daughter Ornella's birthday wish, when Lola arrived in our little family, that little ball of fur, we fell in love, and with her came the love for this beautiful breed.
soDoodle.description2: Lola is undoubtedly special, with unique tenderness, who has given so much love and joy to our lives in a way we could never have imagined.

delivery.title: Puppies
delivery.description: Each litter is thought out and created with careful selection of parents, evaluating both character and beauty characteristics. We only work with dogs from authentic bloodlines. Puppies are born in our home, no cages, lots of cuddles, attention and care.
delivery.description2: Puppies leave the nest between 8 and 10 weeks, but don't worry, by this point you'll be ready, full of advice, information and above all having the certainty of being able to contact us!! Nothing but immense joy to begin this new adventure full of love together with a Labradoodle.

breed.title: The Breed: Australian Labradoodle
breed.subtitle: The Labradoodle is a breed that originated in Australia in the 80's.
breed.description: It is a consolidated breed with multiple generations, it is an accurate Pedigree, not a simple cross between a Labrador and a first generation Poodle (F1). It was created to produce a healthy, intelligent and sociable dog that doesn't shed and doesn't emit dog odor, ideal for family life and therapeutic work.
breed.description2: With a beautiful character, sensitive, very suitable for children and not only because with just one look it manages to melt your heart. A friend for life who will surprise you every day with his tenderness and sweetness.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before adoption

what.a: It is a breed developed for companionship and therapy, recognized for its stable temperament, intelligence and hypoallergenic coat in many cases.

birth.a: Generally between 8 and 10 weeks, with deworming and updated vaccination plan, plus a welcome kit with everything needed for a smooth transition.

personality.a: They are dogs with a wonderful character, sensitive, very suitable for children. They are intelligent, sociable and with great emotional stability, ideal for family life.

likes.a: Yes, we provide guidance in the early stages of adaptation and recommendations for education, grooming and veterinarians. We maintain contact to ensure the wellbeing of our puppies.
